medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient began experiencing vague abdominal pain and mild nausea on the night prior to presentation. By the afternoon of the following day, the pain intensified and localized to the right lower quadrant. The patient presented to her PCP and was advised to visit the ED.
medical_history.family_history: No gastrointestinal problems. Mother had ovarian cancer. Father had type 2 diabetes and died of heart problems.
